allergies

Determining people’s allergies.

Allergen

(U
 (Val :eggs)
 (Val :cats)
 (Val :tomatoes)
 (Val :peanuts)
 (Val :chocolate)
 (Val :strawberries)
 (Val :pollen)
 (Val :shellfish))

A keyword representing a known allergen.

AllergenIndex

java.lang.Number

A number representing the index of a known Allergen.

view source

allergic-to?

(IFn
 [Score -> [Allergen -> java.lang.Boolean]]
 [Score Allergen -> java.lang.Boolean])
(allergic-to? score)(allergic-to? score allergen)

Given a Score, return a function that takes an Allergen and calls the binary version of allergic-to?.

Given a Score and an Allergen, return true if the Score indicates an allergy to the given Allergen, otherwise false. If the Allergen is not known, return false.

view source

allergies

[Score -> (Vec Allergen)]
(allergies score)

Given a Score, return the vector of Allergens it represents, i.e. the person’s allergies.

view source

Score

java.lang.Number

A number representing a person’s allergies.
